name: Protein Waffles
author: JAIM71
summary: These healthy, protein-packed waffles are fluffy and delicious! No waffle iron? No problem! Make them into pancakes instead. Top with berries, bananas, dark chocolate chips, or anything else you like!
ingredients: 1 splash pure vanilla extract, or to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste
directions: Preheat a waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions
Blend oats, cottage cheese, eggs, egg whites, honey, vanilla extract, and cinnamon in a blender until creamy
Ladle batter into preheated waffle iron according to manufacturer directions and cook the waffles until golden and crisp, about 5 minutes
Repeat until entire batch of batter is used
